name: The Varsano Hotel

reviews.text: Varsano Luxury Suites is located in the idyllic setting of Neve Tzedek, Tel Aviv.
reviews.title: For a Fabulous experience in Neve Tzedek

reviews.text: The Varsano brothers (who are as sweet as sugar), renovated a building that was 150 years old to the charming apartment suites they are today. They thought of everything when it came to design, materials, esthethics, and decor. The apartments are appointed with colored concrete, and marble, and glass and natural woods. Decor consists of Chintz fabrics, crystal cut glasses, Chrome carts, and quaint country French dinnerware!
reviews.title: A hidden gem in the most interesting area of tel aviv

description: The Varsano Hotel is located in the unique Neve Tzedek neighborhood, making it the perfect vacation spot. The hotel itself is built on a historical ground, in the oldest part of Tel Aviv. Only a three minute walk to the beach, Neve Tzedek has a fine selection of boutique shops, cafes, restaurants and romantic bars. Our suites capture Tel Aviv's modern, Mediterranean essence, while our concierge service will care for your every need. Enjoy the convenience of a luxurious, full service home away from home...
